titles.title: To amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to require nursing facilities to be air conditioned to receive Medicare or Medicaid funding.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Commerce, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to House Ways and Means
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health and Environment.

bill.summary: 7/20/2000--Introduced. Amends titles XVIII (Medicare) and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to require nursing facilities to be air conditioned as a condition for receiving Medicare or Medicaid funding.
